revised_title: On the Principal Electric Time-Constant of a Circular Disk: Analyzing Resistance and Decay
tldr: This article explores the electric time-constant of a circular disk, focusing on the relationship between resistance, decay, and the disk's properties. The author, Horace Lamb, examines the resistance and time-constant of various materials, such as iron and non-magnetic substances, and provides insights into the behavior of electric currents in these materials.
